Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: judo \judo\ n. a sport adapted from jujitsu, originally a method of self-defense without weapons, and similar to wrestling; it was developed in Japan. [WordNet 1.5 +PJC]
judo n : a sport adapted from jujitsu (using principles of not resisting) and similar to wrestling; developed in Japan
